title: Imaging technique finds differences between radiation-sensitive and resistant tumors

title_detail.value: Imaging technique finds differences between radiation-sensitive and resistant tumors

summary: Researchers have begun pilot clinical trials using an imaging technique called Raman spectroscopy, which offers promise for guided cancer treatment and could spare some patients of the toxic side effects of ineffective radiation therapy.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have begun pilot clinical trials using an imaging technique called Raman spectroscopy, which offers promise for guided cancer treatment and could spare some patients of the toxic side effects of ineffective radiation therapy.
